Name: Pisco Naranja
Ingredients: 40 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Aromatic brandy and orange juice pepped and sweetened with a slug of orange liqueur.
History: Based on the traditional Chilean combination of pisco and orange juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Pisco Naranja contains 168 calories
